item.title: Trump plans to appoint US general to lead Gaza security force, Axios reports
item.description: The Trump administration is planning to appoint an American two-star general to command the International Stabilization Force in Gaza, Axios reported on Thursday, citing two US officials and two Israeli officials. Reuters could not immediately confirm the report.
